code: import React,{useState}from'react';import workapi from'./API/WorksApi.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Howitworks(){const[workData]=useState(workapi);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-container container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"main-heading text-center",children:"How Does It Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:workData.map(curElem=>{const{logo,title,info}=curElem;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-lg-4 text-center work-container-subdiv",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fontawesome-style ".concat(logo)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"main-hero-para w-100",children:info})]})})});})})]})})});}export default Howitworks;
